title: Guns and Crime - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/30/19
itunes:title: Guns and Crime - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/30/19
description:
George Noory and economist John Lott explore the push by the government to limit the public's access to guns for self defense, and how guns can by used by everyday people to stop criminals.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

itunes:summary: A gun expert explains how guns in the hands of the public can decrease crime.
